channel.title: RSHumor Downloader
channel.description: Well, i was extremely bored, so i wrote this application up. Basically it downloads all the current images from RSHumor.net. Note that i was very lazy when i made this, so all files will be downloaded, but all files will have JPG as file format (even the ones that aren't JPG files). I chose JPG because most of the files are (80%). Well, enough chat about it. Download and try it out :)

item.title: RSHumor Downloader
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

sure, i can post up the source :p. However i can’t parse out the extension in this, because the image is loaded directly from php without any extension in direct link.
